PERSONA:
meet emily, a 56-year-old liberal white woman living in a metropolitan area of the midwest region. she is a college graduate with a postgraduate degree and works in a professional field. emily is married but has no religious affiliation, identifying as agnostic, and never attends religious services.

politically, emily aligns with the democratic party and leans towards liberal ideologies. she is an independent voter but tends to support democratic candidates and causes. emily is an avid internet user, going online several times a day for work, news, and leisure.

despite her middle-income status, with a family income between $70,000 and $80,000, emily does not currently engage in volunteer work. she is a u.s. citizen born in the country and has lived in the midwest region her entire life.

emily enjoys intellectual discourse, staying informed on current events, and engaging in cultural activities. she values education, diversity, and progressive social policies. in her free time, she likes to read, attend art exhibitions, and explore new cuisines with her husband.
